name: Lenz Heat Mitts 4.0 (Batteries Sold Separately) - Women's
description: A battery-powered heating element hidden in your mitts is technology's answer to winter's coldest days. A durable, waterproof shell with Primaloft® insulation and fleece lining keeps your hands warm in cool conditions, but for deeply cold days, connect Lenz's lithium battery packs to heat fingers and keep your manual dexterity. Heating elements keep you warm and cozy while skiing, snowshoeing or climbing – plus, the index area and thumb are touchscreen-compatible, so you can take a photo at the viewpoint without taking off your mitts.Waterproof polyester, leather and nylon shell has 4-way stretch for full dexterity.Polyester fleece lining adds warmth without excess bulk.Goat leather palm for durability and grip.Primaloft® insulation in backs of hands.Integrated heat element on top of the fingers and thumb keeps your hands warm.Touchscreen-compatible index and thumb let you cycle songs without removing mitts.Compatible with Lenz Lithium Pack rcB 1200 and rcB 1800 (sold separately).
